title: 39 Luxury Gifts Worth the Splurge in 2025
description: Feeling a little fancy? We’ve got just the right high-design finds for you
author: Audrey Lee
excerpt: Looking for luxury gifts? Check out the the best (albeit expensive) gifts around, including luxe skin care, Dyson gadgets, Apple goodies, designer bags, and more
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Though we don’t think luxury gifts are necessarily the best ones, there are those special occasions like the holidays where it’s appropriate to go all out for your loved one. So if you’re looking to treat someone on your list that’s been extra good (or maybe even treat yourself), we’ve rounded up some of the best luxury gifts to give when money’s no object. The best part? Though each of our stylish selections is undoubtedly luxurious, they’ll still show your recipient you put tons of care into selecting a thoughtful present. Keep scrolling to shop some of the best luxury gift options—including a high-end espresso machine, professional-grade massage gun, state-of-the-art pizza oven, and much more.Shop our top picks:Best Gift For Wellness Aficionados: Lunya Washable Silk Long Sleeve Pant Set, $298 at LunyaBest Gift For Design Lovers: Onirique Table Lamp by Athena Calderone, $599 at Crate & BarrelBest Gift For Travelers: Rimowa Original Cabin Suitcase, $1,430 at RimowaBest Skincare Gift: La Mer Essential Discovery Collection, $200 at NordstromBest Gift For Outdoor Hosts: Solo Stove Yukon 2.0, $450 at Solo StoveMost Fashionable Gift: Yves Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Leather Shoulder Bag, $979 $3,100 at Net-a-Porter1/39Lunya Washable Silk Long Sleeve Pant SetThere's nothing quite like slipping into comfy loungewear at the end of your day. This mulberry silk pajama set from Lunya is a bestseller for a reason—plus you can level up the gift with a matching silk sleep mask from the brand.2/39Onirique Table Lamp by Athena CalderoneWe think Athena Calderone’s latest designs for Crate & Barrel make very good gifts for the design-conscious crowd. The Onirique statement lamp will add some sex appeal and mystique to any bare coffee table, console, or nightstand.3/39Rimowa Original Cabin 22-Inch Wheeled Carry-OnAnd for that special someone who's constantly hopping on and off flights, upgrade their old luggage to a sturdy Rimowa, the brand beloved by everyone from Rihanna to Robert Pattinson.4/39La Mer Essential Discovery CollectionThis gift set, chock-full of bestsellers from La Mer, packs a whole lot of hydration, meaning your giftee will be set through the drier months. The full routine includes a cleanser, two hydrating serums, and the cult-favorite Crème de la Mer cream to keep moisture on lock and skin looking dewy.5/39Yukon 2.0Next up on our list of the best expensive gifts is this quirky pick that's perfect for that one friend that's always camping. They'll love taking this portable and smokeless fire pit on their next getaway.6/39Yves Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Leather Shoulder BagA Saint Laurent leather tote bag is sure to evoke major bag envy at the office. We like that the Le 5 à 7 silhouette is large enough to fit a standard Macbook Pro, and best of all, is a chic way to upgrade any basic outfit.7/39Sabre Off-White Bistrot Vintage Flatware SetThis 24-piece cutlery set from French label Sabre features high-quality, handcrafted tortoiseshell acrylic handles to really impress your guests at the next dinner party.8/39Ooni Koda 12 Gas Powered Pizza OvenIt sounds like everyone—from our digital design writer Zoë Sessums to Andrew Rea (aka Binging with Babish)—approves of Ooni's pizza oven. With the ability to cook a fresh 12-inch pizza pie in just 60 seconds, say goodbye to the days of waiting for delivery.9/39Theragun Prime (5th generation)Up their wellness and self-care routine with the latest from Theragun. Achy joints won’t stand a chance against the Theragun Prime, whose rotating percussion arm and ergonomic multigrip deliver professional-grade muscle treatments to your sore spots. It’s also got five customizable speed ranges, Bluetooth capabilities, and built-in technology that keeps noise levels at a soothingly low level.10/39Mejuri Diamonds Cluster RingNothing catches the eye like a shiny little ring. This 14-karat yellow gold design from Mejuri is set with a swath of diamonds for an added touch of glamour.11/39Tumi Extended Trip Expandable SuitcaseIf they're master over-packers, level them up with this sleek Tumi checked luggage that's designed for extra-long getaways. It’s incredibly lightweight and has an expandable design to ensure they’ll be able to pick up a few souvenirs during their trip without fighting to zip everything up.12/39Oribe Gold Lust Repair & Restore Shampoo and Conditioner BundleWe all want to be the friend with really good hair. This revitalizing shampoo and conditioner combo from Oribe achieves that with a bio-restorative formula that reverses damage from your roots.13/39Casa TeoA trip to Mexico City is always a welcome surprise. We recommend checking into Casa Teo, a unique Airbnb from our curated guide that’s actually owned by renowned chef Enrique Olivera and sits on the former location of his iconic restaurant Pujol.14/39Naked Cashmere Ynes RobeNest on our wish list, slipping into a heavenly cashmere robe after a long day will make her feel ultra luxe. This one from Naked cashmere comes in nine sumptuous shades and is available for him as well.15/39Cuzen Matcha Matcha Maker Starter KitIf their taste buds lean more towards tea, we think Cuzen Matcha’s Matcha Maker Starter Kit is a worthwhile investment. With one click, it grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a shot of matcha that you can enjoy with your favorite milk, over ice, or both. The artfully designed machine (which holds leaves for up to 20 matcha drinks at a time) even allows you to control how much matcha you want in your shot for a quick and easy way to enjoy a fresh drink any time.16/39Brooklinen Heathered Cashmere Duvet BundleFor the one on your list who spends the winter months draped in cashmere, Brooklinen’s cashmere duvet-and-comforter set will keep their bed setup feeling extra luxurious.17/39Bottega Veneta Brown Long Andiamo Clutch18/39Quince 14k Gold Lab Grown Diamond Oval Solitaire StudsWe like that these oval-shaped lab grown diamonds are a subtle variation of classic studs that still feel modern. Perfect for daily wear or special occasions, your jewelry-obsessed gift recipient will keep these in their rotation for years to come.19/39Snow Peak Alpha Breeze TentIf they spend their weekends connecting with nature, a tent that’s both durable and design-forward will bring comfort to their outdoor adventures. Snow Peak’s Alpha Breeze tent comfortably fits up to four campers, includes an extended vestibule, and has a lightweight design that makes it easy to trek through even rocky terrains.20/39Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete LongWe swear by Dyson products, and this is the undisputed Cadillac of hair styling tools. The tech-savvy gadget simultaneously dries and styles hair with three precise airflow speeds to suit your needs—a perfect gift idea whether it’s for the holidays, a birthday, or anything else.21/39Monica Vinader Lab Grown Diamond Riva Kite Pendant Charm SetMinimalist jewelry aficionados will love how this delicate diamond necklace catches the light and adds some sparkle to mundane outfits.22/39Cartier Gold CT0430S SunglassesSure, you could opt for a Love bracelet or a classic Tank—but these Cartier sunglasses are the key to adding inherent cool factor to any ensemble.23/39Zoe Bios Creative Stained Glass Wall ArtInspired by stained glass, this textile work from Catherine Lisle will have a treasured place in their gallery wall.24/39Shinola The Runwell BicycleHere’s a bike that can take them from city streets to vacations in the Hamptons. The French-inspired design is virtually maintenance free and built to handle commutes to the office, even in rain or snow.25/39Bang & Olufsen Beolit 20 Portable Wireless Bluetooth SpeakerWhen we visited Alicia Keys and Swizz Beatz at their Los Angeles home, we couldn’t help but notice the couple’s devotion to Bang & Olufsen. And while you may not be a Grammy winner (yet), the brand’s portable Beolit wireless speaker helps elevate your favorite tunes, whether it’s stationed in the living room or a summer party sound system.26/39Boroux Legacy Water Filter SystemBoroux’s water purification system effectively removes harmful chemicals and bacteria from your hydration routine. With the ability to clean up to 24,000 gallons of water, the four-filter filtration device has been backed by lab-driven results to guarantee you’re hydrating with only the purest water.27/3972 Rouge Bruni Hermès Abysse Shiny LipstickDress up their cosmetics bag with some high-end everyday products. We especially like that the container to this Hermes lipstick almost reminds us of a James Turrell piece.28/39Tumi Celina BackpackFor the commuter or perpetual traveler on your gifting list, this Tumi backpack is the perfect holiday gift that can fit daily essentials like their current read and lunch box or enough clothing for a weekend getaway.29/39Breville Barista Touch Espresso MachineAnyone who’s a serious caffeine enthusiast will enjoy this sleek stainless steel espresso machine with over 1,000 five-star reviews from Breville. It’s got features like an interactive touch screen for easy drink selection as well as a built-in grinder, steam wand, and an ultra-fast heating system to serve up steaming cups of café-quality java from the comfort of your own kitchen.30/39Toteme Leather GlovesGloves make a great gift for the holidays, especially when the temperatures start dropping. With soft nappa leather and a wool-and-cashmere lining, this sleek pair from Toteme will keep their fingers warm all winter long.31/39Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones And for the over-the-ear set, you can't go wrong with these astonishingly crisp Bluetooth headphones from Bose.32/39KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Stand MixerNothing will say I love you and your cooking like giving what’s regarded as the gold standard of stand mixers. And while you’re at it, why not throw in some fun add-ons like attachments for making pasta, juice, and shredding veggies?33/39Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and OttomanAfter tying out the incomparable Eames Lounge Chair for herself, our former social media manager Elise Portale concluded, “The Eameses built the impossible: A chair that’s comfortable no matter how you want to sit in it.”34/39Sonos 2 Room Set with Era 100This easy-to-use pair of Sonos bluetooth speakers helps set the mood across multiple rooms. Compact enough to fit in just about any space, your giftee can play or stream crystal-clear audio directly from their phone or tablet, or with help from their virtual assistant.35/39Apple Watch Series 9This year surprise your loved one with a smart watch in lieu of a regular timepiece. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant (not to mention, it will perfectly complement your iPhone and AirPods Pro).36/39Loewe Home Scents Ivy Large Scented CandleWhen we asked our editor-in-chief Amy Astley about one of her latest MVP purchases, she pointed us in the direction of this next-level candle from Loewe. “I love the chunkiness, the heft, [and] the jumbo size,” she says. Amy adds that when the candle has burned down, “you can keep the vessel for anything you want—and it’s nice that this one isn’t delicate and teeny.” (Looking for more candle inspo? Check out our guide to the best-smelling candles with faves from Diptyque, Voluspa, Boy Smells and more.)37/39Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge Eau de ParfumVelvety notes of jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, and ambergris make up Baccarat and Francis Kurkdjian’s Rouge 540 scent, beloved by celebrities like Olivia Rodrigo.38/39USM x Symbol Record CrateIf their prized possession is a Haller storage unit, this matching USM record crate made in collaboration with Symbol is just the thing that’ll delight.39/39Toteme T-Lock Grained-Leather ClutchLuxury in the palm of your hand? Yes please! Crafted in Italy, this Toteme clutch boasts pebble-grained leather and a microsuede interior. It can easily take your giftee’s look from day to night.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Though we don’t think luxury gifts are necessarily the best ones, there are those special occasions like the holidays where it’s appropriate to go all out for your loved one. So if you’re looking to treat someone on your list that’s been extra good (or maybe even treat yourself), we’ve rounded up some of the best luxury gifts to give when money’s no object. The best part? Though each of our stylish selections is undoubtedly luxurious, they’ll still show your recipient you put tons of care into selecting a thoughtful present. Keep scrolling to shop some of the best luxury gift options—including a high-end espresso machine, professional-grade massage gun, state-of-the-art pizza oven, and much more.

Shop our top picks:

  • Best Gift For Wellness Aficionados: Lunya Washable Silk Long Sleeve Pant Set, $298 at Lunya
  • Best Gift For Design Lovers: Onirique Table Lamp by Athena Calderone, $599 at Crate & Barrel
  • Best Gift For Travelers: Rimowa Original Cabin Suitcase, $1,430 at Rimowa
  • Best Skincare Gift: La Mer Essential Discovery Collection, $200 at Nordstrom
  • Best Gift For Outdoor Hosts: Solo Stove Yukon 2.0, $450 at Solo Stove
  • Most Fashionable Gift: Yves Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Leather Shoulder Bag, $979 $3,100 at Net-a-Porter

  • 1/39

    Lunya Washable Silk Long Sleeve Pant Set

    There's nothing quite like slipping into comfy loungewear at the end of your day. This mulberry silk pajama set from Lunya is a bestseller for a reason—plus you can level up the gift with a matching silk sleep mask from the brand.

  • 2/39

    Onirique Table Lamp by Athena Calderone

    We think Athena Calderone’s latest designs for Crate & Barrel make very good gifts for the design-conscious crowd. The Onirique statement lamp will add some sex appeal and mystique to any bare coffee table, console, or nightstand.

  • 3/39

    Rimowa Original Cabin 22-Inch Wheeled Carry-On

    And for that special someone who's constantly hopping on and off flights, upgrade their old luggage to a sturdy Rimowa, the brand beloved by everyone from Rihanna to Robert Pattinson.

  • 4/39

    La Mer Essential Discovery Collection

    This gift set, chock-full of bestsellers from La Mer, packs a whole lot of hydration, meaning your giftee will be set through the drier months. The full routine includes a cleanser, two hydrating serums, and the cult-favorite Crème de la Mer cream to keep moisture on lock and skin looking dewy.

  • 5/39

    Yukon 2.0

    Next up on our list of the best expensive gifts is this quirky pick that's perfect for that one friend that's always camping. They'll love taking this portable and smokeless fire pit on their next getaway.

  • 6/39

    Yves Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Leather Shoulder Bag

    A Saint Laurent leather tote bag is sure to evoke major bag envy at the office. We like that the Le 5 à 7 silhouette is large enough to fit a standard Macbook Pro, and best of all, is a chic way to upgrade any basic outfit.

  • 7/39

    Sabre Off-White Bistrot Vintage Flatware Set

    This 24-piece cutlery set from French label Sabre features high-quality, handcrafted tortoiseshell acrylic handles to really impress your guests at the next dinner party.

  • 8/39

    Ooni Koda 12 Gas Powered Pizza Oven

    It sounds like everyone—from our digital design writer Zoë Sessums to Andrew Rea (aka Binging with Babish)—approves of Ooni's pizza oven. With the ability to cook a fresh 12-inch pizza pie in just 60 seconds, say goodbye to the days of waiting for delivery.

  • 9/39

    Theragun Prime (5th generation)

    Up their wellness and self-care routine with the latest from Theragun. Achy joints won’t stand a chance against the Theragun Prime, whose rotating percussion arm and ergonomic multigrip deliver professional-grade muscle treatments to your sore spots. It’s also got five customizable speed ranges, Bluetooth capabilities, and built-in technology that keeps noise levels at a soothingly low level.

  • 10/39

    Mejuri Diamonds Cluster Ring

    Nothing catches the eye like a shiny little ring. This 14-karat yellow gold design from Mejuri is set with a swath of diamonds for an added touch of glamour.

  • 11/39

    Tumi Extended Trip Expandable Suitcase

    If they're master over-packers, level them up with this sleek Tumi checked luggage that's designed for extra-long getaways. It’s incredibly lightweight and has an expandable design to ensure they’ll be able to pick up a few souvenirs during their trip without fighting to zip everything up.

  • 12/39

    Oribe Gold Lust Repair & Restore Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle

    We all want to be the friend with really good hair. This revitalizing shampoo and conditioner combo from Oribe achieves that with a bio-restorative formula that reverses damage from your roots.

  • 13/39

    Casa Teo

    A trip to Mexico City is always a welcome surprise. We recommend checking into Casa Teo, a unique Airbnb from our curated guide that’s actually owned by renowned chef Enrique Olivera and sits on the former location of his iconic restaurant Pujol.

  • 14/39

    Naked Cashmere Ynes Robe

    Nest on our wish list, slipping into a heavenly cashmere robe after a long day will make her feel ultra luxe. This one from Naked cashmere comes in nine sumptuous shades and is available for him as well.

  • 15/39

    Cuzen Matcha Matcha Maker Starter Kit

    If their taste buds lean more towards tea, we think Cuzen Matcha’s Matcha Maker Starter Kit is a worthwhile investment. With one click, it grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a shot of matcha that you can enjoy with your favorite milk, over ice, or both. The artfully designed machine (which holds leaves for up to 20 matcha drinks at a time) even allows you to control how much matcha you want in your shot for a quick and easy way to enjoy a fresh drink any time.

  • 16/39

    Brooklinen Heathered Cashmere Duvet Bundle

    For the one on your list who spends the winter months draped in cashmere, Brooklinen’s cashmere duvet-and-comforter set will keep their bed setup feeling extra luxurious.

  • 17/39

    Bottega Veneta Brown Long Andiamo Clutch

  • 18/39

    Quince 14k Gold Lab Grown Diamond Oval Solitaire Studs

    We like that these oval-shaped lab grown diamonds are a subtle variation of classic studs that still feel modern. Perfect for daily wear or special occasions, your jewelry-obsessed gift recipient will keep these in their rotation for years to come.

  • 19/39

    Snow Peak Alpha Breeze Tent

    If they spend their weekends connecting with nature, a tent that’s both durable and design-forward will bring comfort to their outdoor adventures. Snow Peak’s Alpha Breeze tent comfortably fits up to four campers, includes an extended vestibule, and has a lightweight design that makes it easy to trek through even rocky terrains.

  • 20/39

    Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long

    We swear by Dyson products, and this is the undisputed Cadillac of hair styling tools. The tech-savvy gadget simultaneously dries and styles hair with three precise airflow speeds to suit your needs—a perfect gift idea whether it’s for the holidays, a birthday, or anything else.

  • 21/39

    Monica Vinader Lab Grown Diamond Riva Kite Pendant Charm Set

    Minimalist jewelry aficionados will love how this delicate diamond necklace catches the light and adds some sparkle to mundane outfits.

  • 22/39

    Cartier Gold CT0430S Sunglasses

    Sure, you could opt for a Love bracelet or a classic Tank—but these Cartier sunglasses are the key to adding inherent cool factor to any ensemble.

  • 23/39

    Zoe Bios Creative Stained Glass Wall Art

    Inspired by stained glass, this textile work from Catherine Lisle will have a treasured place in their gallery wall.

  • 24/39

    Shinola The Runwell Bicycle

    Here’s a bike that can take them from city streets to vacations in the Hamptons. The French-inspired design is virtually maintenance free and built to handle commutes to the office, even in rain or snow.

  • 25/39

    Bang & Olufsen Beolit 20 Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker

    When we visited Alicia Keys and Swizz Beatz at their Los Angeles home, we couldn’t help but notice the couple’s devotion to Bang & Olufsen. And while you may not be a Grammy winner (yet), the brand’s portable Beolit wireless speaker helps elevate your favorite tunes, whether it’s stationed in the living room or a summer party sound system.

  • 26/39

    Boroux Legacy Water Filter System

    Boroux’s water purification system effectively removes harmful chemicals and bacteria from your hydration routine. With the ability to clean up to 24,000 gallons of water, the four-filter filtration device has been backed by lab-driven results to guarantee you’re hydrating with only the purest water.

  • 27/39

    72 Rouge Bruni Hermès Abysse Shiny Lipstick

    Dress up their cosmetics bag with some high-end everyday products. We especially like that the container to this Hermes lipstick almost reminds us of a James Turrell piece.

  • 28/39

    Tumi Celina Backpack

    For the commuter or perpetual traveler on your gifting list, this Tumi backpack is the perfect holiday gift that can fit daily essentials like their current read and lunch box or enough clothing for a weekend getaway.

  • 29/39

    Breville Barista Touch Espresso Machine

    Anyone who’s a serious caffeine enthusiast will enjoy this sleek stainless steel espresso machine with over 1,000 five-star reviews from Breville. It’s got features like an interactive touch screen for easy drink selection as well as a built-in grinder, steam wand, and an ultra-fast heating system to serve up steaming cups of café-quality java from the comfort of your own kitchen.

  • 30/39

    Toteme Leather Gloves

    Gloves make a great gift for the holidays, especially when the temperatures start dropping. With soft nappa leather and a wool-and-cashmere lining, this sleek pair from Toteme will keep their fingers warm all winter long.

  • 31/39

    Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones

    And for the over-the-ear set, you can't go wrong with these astonishingly crisp Bluetooth headphones from Bose.

  • 32/39

    KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Stand Mixer

    Nothing will say I love you and your cooking like giving what’s regarded as the gold standard of stand mixers. And while you’re at it, why not throw in some fun add-ons like attachments for making pasta, juice, and shredding veggies?

  • 33/39

    Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman

    After tying out the incomparable Eames Lounge Chair for herself, our former social media manager Elise Portale concluded, “The Eameses built the impossible: A chair that’s comfortable no matter how you want to sit in it.”

  • 34/39

    Sonos 2 Room Set with Era 100

    This easy-to-use pair of Sonos bluetooth speakers helps set the mood across multiple rooms. Compact enough to fit in just about any space, your giftee can play or stream crystal-clear audio directly from their phone or tablet, or with help from their virtual assistant.

  • 35/39

    Apple Watch Series 9

    This year surprise your loved one with a smart watch in lieu of a regular timepiece. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant (not to mention, it will perfectly complement your iPhone and AirPods Pro).

  • 36/39

    Loewe Home Scents Ivy Large Scented Candle

    When we asked our editor-in-chief Amy Astley about one of her latest MVP purchases, she pointed us in the direction of this next-level candle from Loewe. “I love the chunkiness, the heft, [and] the jumbo size,” she says. Amy adds that when the candle has burned down, “you can keep the vessel for anything you want—and it’s nice that this one isn’t delicate and teeny.” (Looking for more candle inspo? Check out our guide to the best-smelling candles with faves from Diptyque, Voluspa, Boy Smells and more.)

  • 37/39

    Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge Eau de Parfum

    Velvety notes of jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, and ambergris make up Baccarat and Francis Kurkdjian’s Rouge 540 scent, beloved by celebrities like Olivia Rodrigo.

  • 38/39

    USM x Symbol Record Crate

    If their prized possession is a Haller storage unit, this matching USM record crate made in collaboration with Symbol is just the thing that’ll delight.

  • 39/39

    Toteme T-Lock Grained-Leather Clutch

    Luxury in the palm of your hand? Yes please! Crafted in Italy, this Toteme clutch boasts pebble-grained leather and a microsuede interior. It can easily take your giftee’s look from day to night.
